SEARCH
Module booking.fxui
Package booking.fxui.internal

Class RestAccess

java.lang.Object
booking.fxui.internal.RestAccess
public final class RestAccess extends Object
A class that provides access to the hotel booking system's REST API.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    • bookRoomByNumber

      public void bookRoomByNumber(int roomNumber, LocalDate from, LocalDate to, String username, int totalCostOfBooking, String which) throws Exception
      Books a room.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - The room number.
      from - The start date of the booking.
      to - The end date of the booking.
      username - The username of the user booking the room.
      totalCostOfBooking - The total cost of the booking.
      which - If which = "room", only update room, if which = "user", only update user, if which = "both", update both.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the room is already booked.

    • cancelBooking

      public void cancelBooking(int roomNumber, String username, LocalDate from, LocalDate to, int totalCostOfBooking) throws Exception
      Cancels a booking.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - The room number.
      username - The username.
      from - The start date of the booking.
      to - The end date of the booking.
      totalCostOfBooking - The total cost of the booking.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the booking does not exist.
